resources.string: 1. Include at least one food from each food group (vegetables and fruits; cereals and tubers, legumes and animal products) in each of the three meals a day.

"2. Eat as much variety of foods as possible: - Lots of vegetables and fruits, as much as possible raw and with peel. - Enough cereals (tortillas, whole wheat bread, pasta and crackers, rice or oatmeal) combined with legumes (beans, lentils, lima beans or chickpeas). - Few foods of animal origin, preferring fish or chicken, without skin, to pork, lamb, kid or beef. "
3. Eat according to your needs and conditions. No more, no less.

"4. Consume as little fat, oils, sugar and salt as possible: - Prefer oils to lard, butter or margarine. - Cook with little salt, sweeten with little sugar, do not put it on the table and moderate the consumption of products that contain them in excess. "

"6. Ensure maximum hygiene when storing, preparing and consuming food: - Drink only boiled water or water disinfected with chlorine or colloidal silver. - Wash and disinfect vegetables and fruits that are eaten raw. - Wash your hands with soap and water before eating and after using the toilet or changing diapers. - Fish and shellfish should be eaten well cooked. "

"7. Accumulate 30 minutes of physical activity a day. - Start with periods of 5 to 10 minutes and gradually increase the time. - Try to get your heart rate up and your breathing faster but be able to talk without suffocating. "
8. Maintain a healthy weight, the excess and lack of it favors the development of health problems.
9. If you drink alcoholic beverages, do not drink more than two drinks a day and do it only with food. Avoid smoking, if you smoke try to quit, the sooner the better.
